name: GG Abandoned Levels
description:
Don't go into the water on level 3 or jump off the bridge in the final level as you will drown and have no way of getting back onto dry land. 

These are some of the best levels I created while trying to make a game on Game Guru. The engine is known for being buggy and having issues, but It aims to help developers create a game with no coding experience.  Explore each level and find the open doorway to the next level. I would have liked to have a more professional look to the game (i.e. custom thumbnails etc) but in order to make the game playable, liberties had to be made. Some levels had to be left out for example but they are shown here in the screenshots.
